entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
